description: One of the missing Guardian Knights as part of Lamune Baba`s quest to find, before the dark knight was taken by Da Cider during the latter being on Don Harumage`s side of evil before being freed from his influence and joining Lamunes`s party. Its capabilities are equivalent to King Scassher in terms of power, combat specifications, weapons and similar features whenever the Pressurometer (血圧メーター) gauge on Da Cider`s chest reaches "infinity.
name: Queen Cideron
